text: Sarah was considered a member of my family...she knew my parents well while they dated and my sister found the bar on her own. They came back to see her around then, and she acted like a day hadn’t passed.

text: Kopser raised a ton of money and Dems are bullish about #TX21. The district reaches into Austin, so it's fair to assume there'll be some interesting Dems who will think about giving this seat a run. Chip Roy is the incumbent.

text: Well now. Joe Kopser, who gave Republicans a close call in #TX21 in 2018 and floated himself as a Senate contender is...not running for anything. An email to supporters:

text: When asked at a townhall about executive overreach, Beto O'Rourke discusses his evolving opinion of US Rep. Barbara Lee for opposing the AUMF in 2001 & how he now thinks she was right & admires her. (He told me this story a couple of yrs ago when I asked him where he was on 9/11)

text: From C-SPAN archives: Ralph Hall's mother was a close friend of Sam Rayburn. In the 1950s, a group of Rs tried to recruit Hall to run against Rayburn. This was his mother's response: "If you do that, where are you going to get breakfast? You're not going run against Sam Rayburn"

text: I wasn't allowed to watch 90210 as a kid. So I waited until the show was in reruns and watched episodes after school while my mom battled migraines. I only recently confessed this to her, and she was some kind of mad, even now. And it was so incredibly worth it. #RIPLukePerry
